inclusion.criterion: The diagnosis of a definite CABI
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: a CABI diagnosed within the previous year

exclusion.criterion: a CABI diagnosed >6 days prior to screening
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: unknown
